content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/encode/starlette.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
FROM python:3.9

# Set a working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install dependencies
RUN scripts/install

# Run the test suite to verify successfully setting up the environment
RUN scripts/test
